text.section:
Except as provided in this section for an action under § 19-329(a) of this subtitle, any person aggrieved by a final decision of the Secretary in a contested case, as defined in the Administrative Procedure Act, may:
Appeal that decision to the Board of Review of the Department; and
Then take any further appeal allowed by the Administrative Procedure Act.
A person aggrieved by a final decision of the Secretary under § 19-329(a) of this subtitle may not appeal.
